type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.antlr.AntlrSourceVirtualDirectory
type.description: Contract for a Gradle "convention object" that acts as a handler for what I call a virtual directory mapping, injecting a virtual directory named 'antlr' into the project's various org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSet source sets.

method.name: antlr
method.description:
Configures the Antlr source for this set. The given closure is used to configure the org.gradle.api.file.SourceDirectorySet (see #getAntlr) which contains the Antlr source.
param:configureClosure The closure to use to configure the Antlr source.

returns:this

method.name: getAntlr
method.description:
All Antlr source for this source set.

returns:The Antlr source. Never returns null.

property.name: antlr
property.description:
All Antlr source for this source set.

returns:The Antlr source. Never returns null.
